title: SMNTY Classics: Unapologetic
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Unapologetic
description:
For this classic episode of book club, Anney and Samantha discuss Unapologetic: A Black, Queer, And Feminist Mandate for Radical Movements by Charlene Carruthers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
